level_10_steve_jobs.title: 스티브 잡스 스탠포드 연설 (2005)
key_sentences: Thank You. I am honored to be with you today
Today I want to tell you three stories from my life
So why did I drop out?
I couldn't see the value in it
looking back it was one of the best decisions I ever made

level_8_literary.title: 문학적 스토리텔링
key_sentences: I was the first child of parents who dreamed
What are you working on now?

level_6_animation.title: 인사이드 아웃 애니메이션 대화
key_sentences: did he just say we couldn't have dessert?
